Content: Former Minister Johnston Fernando has been further remanded. The Kurunegala High Court has decided to resume the related case tomorrow. The former Minister is accused of misappropriating a sum of 5.2 million rupees of Sathosa funds at the last Northwestern Provincial Council elections. The related lawsuit was taken up for hearing before Kurunegala High Court Judge Menaka Wijesundera today. The recording of evidence took place today. Orders were given to further remand Johnston Fernando and the other suspects who are his private secretary Mohammed Shakir and former Sathosa Chairman Nalin Fernando until tomorrow.
